ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR($RecordType.Name = "Founder Shield", $RecordType.Name = "Alpharoot") &&
AND(
NOT( Auto_Renewal__c = TRUE), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "New Business - BOR")),
OR(
ISBLANK( Target_Bind_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Contractual_Requirements__c ), ISBLANK( Revenues_New__c ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Priority_Level__c)), ISBLANK( Description ), ISBLANK( Qualifying_Notes__c ), ISBLANK( Target_Aggregate_Limit__c ), ISBLANK( Target_Occurrence_Limit__c ), ISBLANK( App_Link__c ) ),
OR(
ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Application Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Need Info From Client"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Need to Submit"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Received")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more missing field is required: Qualifying Information - Industry, Target Bind Date, Target Limits, Contractual Requirements, Revenues, Priority Level, Description, Qualifying Notes, App Link
